title: Clear night, slow city driving with frequent braking.
caption: Red car drives on a city street at night with other cars and traffic lights.

description: The ego vehicle is driving slowly on a city street at night. There are other cars on the road, including a red car in front of the ego vehicle. There are also traffic lights and a roundabout. The weather is clear and visibility is good.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly because of the frequent braking events. It is also maintaining a safe distance from the red car in front of it. The driver is paying attention to the traffic lights and the roundabout ahead to ensure safe navigation.
